title: Summary
content:
Inventive and passionate front-end focused Web Developer since 2014.
Responsive, semantic UI, and a11y oriented. I aim to produce, as much as possible, a pleasant, captivating and practical user experience for everyone.

Born in Lucca(IT), London based.
I grew up developing a marked curiosity, and empathy for nature, besides a DIY and problem-solving aptitude.

Enjoyer in interaction design, unusual interfaces, and innovative UX. Versatile, problem solver and a quick learner. Very passionate about gamification, storytelling, and aesthetics. Addicted to music, visual arts and games.
